English Lessons Tailored to Your Goals

Whether you're preparing for Cambridge exams, aiming for your target IELTS score, or improving your everyday English, I'm here to help you succeed with clear explanations and personalized support.

Cambridge B1/B2/C1 Preparation

Pass your Cambridge B1 Preliminary, B2 First, or C1 Advanced exam with confidence. I'll guide you through every part of the test with clear strategies, practice materials, and personalized feedback on your progress.

IELTS Preparation

Achieve your target IELTS band score for university, immigration, or career opportunities. We'll focus on exam strategies, improve your writing and speaking, and practice with real IELTS test formats.

General English

Improve your everyday English for work, travel, or personal growth. We'll focus on the skills you need: clear grammar explanations, confident speaking, and practical vocabulary you can use right away.

Pronunciation Training

Speak English clearly and confidently with focused pronunciation practice. We'll work on difficult sounds, natural intonation, and fluent speech patterns. Available with all courses.

Why Students Choose English with Daniel

Easy Explanations

Complex grammar made simple with clear, step-by-step explanations you'll actually understand. No confusing rules or difficult terminology.

Personalized Feedback

Individual attention focused on your specific goals, mistakes, and learning style. Every lesson is designed just for you.

International Experience

Proven success teaching Romanian and Chinese students, understanding your unique challenges. I know what works for learners from different backgrounds.

How It Works

1

Book a Free Consultation

Schedule a free 15-minute chat to discuss your goals. We'll talk about what you want to achieve and how I can help.

2

Choose Your Package

Select the lesson package that fits your needs and budget. Flexible options from 5 to 20 lessons.

3

Start Learning

Begin your personalized lessons and track your progress. Every lesson brings you closer to your goals.

4

Achieve Your Goals

Pass your exam or reach your English goals with confidence. Join the students who have already succeeded.

Ready to Improve Your English?

Join students from Romania, China, and around the world who have achieved their English goals.
